item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Blues Pizza
www.bluespizza.com

The New Haven Jazz Orchestra will be performing at 8:00

Free Pizza will be provided along with fried calamari, shrimp and other appetizers.

I apologize but they do not have a bartender so they will only be serving beer and wine. Beer is $3.50-4.50 and the wine is $6.50-8. If you buy the wine by the bottle it is less.

Contact are Melissa (561) 635-3430 or Andrea (203) 641-8083

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***

Post-party location TBD.

Contacts are Melissa VanTine (561) 635-3430 or Andrea (203) 641-8083
item.name: Happy Hour - Blues Pizza
